<S%G2532><s%> It happened, <S%G1096><s%> that he <S%G846><s%> was <S%G1722><s%> reclining at the table <S%G2621><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> house, <S%G3614><s%> and many <S%G4183><s%> tax collectors <S%G5057><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sinners <S%G268><s%> sat <S%G4873><s%> down <S%G2532><s%> with <S%G4873><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> there were <S%G2258><s%> many, <S%G4183><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they followed <S%G190><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

When <S%G191><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> it, <S%G3004><s%> he said to them, <S%G846><s%> "Those who are healthy <S%G2480><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> for a physician, <S%G2395><s%> but <S%G235><s%> those who are <S%G2192><s%> sick. <S%G2560><s%> I came <S%G2064><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> to call <S%G2564><s%> the righteous, <S%G1342><s%> but <S%G235><s%> sinners <S%G268><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> repentance. <S%G3341><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> John <S%G2491><s%>'s disciples <S%G3101><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> were fasting, <S%G3522><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they came <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> asked <S%G3004><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "Why <S%G5101><s%> do John <S%G2491><s%>'s disciples <S%G3101><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> of the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> fast, <S%G3522><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> your <S%G4674><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> don't <S%G3756><s%> fast? <S%G3522><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> It happened <S%G1096><s%> that <S%G3899><s%> he <S%G846><s%> was going <S%G3899><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the Sabbath day <S%G4521><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the grain fields, <S%G4702><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> began, <S%G756><s%> as they went, <S%G3598><s%> to pluck <S%G5089><s%> the ears of grain. <S%G4719><s%>
